title: Mr. Pusskins and Little Whiskers: Another Love Story
description: Mr. Pusskins is back! And this time he's got company...Mr. Pusskins was perfectly happy. That is, until Emily decided to bring home a surprise. A surprise named Little Whiskers.Mr. Pusskins does not want a kitten around. He does not want to play lovely games with that kitten. But, little does Mr. Pusskins know, this pesky pussycat doesn't want to play lovely games either...
author: Sam Lloyd
